about_the_game:
Story


In a world where the Horn and Lausram people are in conflict, the barrier protecting the Horn people's country, Greusdal, has been broken, and the massive Lausram army is advancing.
The Horn people, known for their military prowess, were optimistic and each clan eagerly headed to the frontlines, seeing it as an opportunity to demonstrate their strength. This included the chief of the Solskog clan, Freyja. The people are yet unaware of the cruel fate lurking behind the broken barrier.
This game offers no exhilarating comebacks or legendary swords to change the tide of battle. All that remains is the desolate land and the people crushed by despair. Even if the world and pride they believe in are lost, do we still have the strength to move forward?

Strategy


A unique combat system where every parameter can be the target of normal attacks. Attack "defense" for well-protected enemies or "strength" for those with powerful weapons, adapting your strategy to survive brutal battles.
  • A combat system where all parameters can be attacked. No matter how strong a warrior is, they will gradually weaken as their parameters take damage.
  • Compact design allowing for completion of each map in about 5-10 minutes. Enjoy deep strategy in a short amount of time.
  • Allies who fall in battle never revive. Each move by the player determines their fate.

Highly Replayable Roguelike System


A roguelike system where even story branches change randomly. Enjoy a profound fantasy experience with new discoveries each time you play.
  • The allies who join and the maps you conquer change with each playthrough. Players will tackle different maps with different allies every time.
  • The stories of the characters change with each playthrough. Sometimes they will be allies, other times they will follow a path of opposition.
  • Even if you lose a battle, you can carry over skills and weapons when you start a new game. Face the cruel fate as many times as it takes.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows11 64bit
  • Processor: intel Core i5 4310
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4600

short_description: Lead the warriors of the doomed Kingdom of Klövsdal in this Tactics RPG. Experience a unique combat system where every parameter can be targeted by normal attacks. Enjoy high replayability with randomly changing story branches. Face despairing battles repeatedly and confront cruel fate head-on.
